work.title: De Refsnæsdrenge, de Samsøepiger
The boys of Refsnaes, the girls of Samsoe
De Refsnæsdrenge, de Samsøpiger

history.p: According to his diary, Nielsen composed the song on 11 December 1914.

bibl.title: Carl Nielsen's Voice. His Songs in Context
